info.name: Dark_4chan
info.description:
Dark and simple theme for 4chan. I made it from scratch. If you notice any error or want to see a feature please contact me.

Please leave some feedback so I can improve!
info.additionalInfo:
Update: Small fixes
Update: Some more small improvements. Full support for 4chan-x!
Update: Some small improvements
Update: Fixed 4channel
Update: 4chan X support! https://www.4chan-x.net/
Update: Fixed spoiler color as suggested by eetee
Update: Whole Captcha is black.
Update: Made small improvements as said. Trying to make the Captcha black when filling it, I'm working on it!
Update: Managed to make the Captcha black! Working on other small improvements.
Update: Changed Mod span name from #800080 to white.
Update: Small update, I improved some small details. Spoiler improved, now you are able to distinguish it from the black background.
